translations: n.竞赛，竞赛活动（contest 的复数形式）
vt.辩论，争辩（contest 的三单形式）

phrs.translation: 无赛事；无竞争；不抗辩；无争议
势均力敌的竞争(指竞选等)

sentences.sentence: Why not hold spider of the week contests in your home throughout this season?
sentences.translation: 在这整个季节里，为什么不在你家里举行蜘蛛周竞赛？

sentences.sentence: Few contests in the recent history of boxing have been as thrilling.
sentences.translation: 在近期拳击史上没有几场比赛曾如此惊心动魄。

sentences.sentence: Should we just blow up these contests?
sentences.translation: 我们应该鼓励这些比赛吗？
